amendment.description: To expand the requirement that space allotted to child care providers in Federal buildings will be used to provide child care services to children of whom at least 50 percent have 1 parent or guardian employed by the Federal Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2839 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2839 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Bennet.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2839 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2839 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Bennet.
